attributes.action: increase the minimum driving age limit fom 17 to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would have an immediate effect of reducing congestion and will hopefully rid our roads of many young and irresponsible drivers. To encourage young people to walk/cycle may help to reduce obesity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
